scripts.build:client: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dist=path.join(process.cwd(),'dist','vanilla');if(fs.existsSync(dist))fs.rmSync(dist,{recursive:true,force:true});" && vite build --outDir ./dist/vanilla && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'dist','vanilla','index.html');const dest=path.join(process.cwd(),'dist','vanilla','404.html');if(fs.existsSync(src))fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);"
scripts.build:without-ssg: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server
scripts.build: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:ssg
scripts.preview:csr-with-build: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run preview:csr
scripts.preview:ssr-with-build: pnpm run build:without-ssg && pnpm run preview:ssr
scripts.preview:ssg-with-build: pnpm run build && pnpm run preview:ssg
scripts.serve:test:dev: concurrently -n "DevCSR,DevSSR,ProdCSR,ProdSSR,SSG" -c "#FF6B6B,#006D77,#FFD166,#6A5ACD,#00C2A8" "pnpm run dev" "pnpm run dev:ssr" "pnpm run preview:csr" "pnpm run preview:ssr" "pnpm run preview:ssg"
scripts.serve:test: pnpm run build:without-ssg && pnpm run build:ssg && pnpm run serve:test:dev
